description_md: We are introducing the Bryn messenger bag in Ivory color. It’s made of quilt fabric with the signature touch of our limited edition which means the lightest with style is guaranteed. Just wear it over the shoulder and walk hands free in fashion. The design is clean and sleek that emphasize your uniqueness.This bag is convenient for carrying documents, laptop and other needed things. Don’t forget the comfort provided by adjustable soft texture of cotton straps.
